channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Domestic rubbish dumped in the usual spot on Lassell Street by Orlop Street, 28th October
item.description:
If someone could clear this I’d be grateful Thanks Chris

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 115, Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders rubble dumped in bags on Old Woolwich Road outside the stonemasons yard, 28th October
item.description:
I reported this about a week ago. One of your team has closed the report saying they drove down the street and couldn’t see it. It is impossible to miss. Come down Lassell Street from Trafalgar Road, turn left onto Old Woolwich Road and the bags are outside the wall of the stonemasons yard. Could someone come again and pick this up. Thanks Chris

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100, Old Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really bad fly tipping, 28th October
item.description:
Afternoon I put a report in 6 days ago on fix my street.co.uk and nothing has happened now it has doubled in size and something needs to happen as it’s an pensioners over 60s road and needs access for emergency vehicles a car was damaged this morning by a piece of wood so please can someone help

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heavitree Close, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 28th October
item.description:
